article: Everyone  _  tired sometimes. When you are tired, You should follow the doctor's advice. First, you should go to bed early  _  a few nights. You shouldn't  go out  at night or study  _  . Having a good rest  _  good for your health. Second, you should  exercise  every day. Third, you should eat fruit and other  healthy food  ,and it's important  to eat  a balanced diet .Don't  _  stressed out , or it makes you sick. You should  listen to  some music . You shouldn't study when you are tired . If you take the advice above , you'll be a healthy person.
